subHeader: Find answers to the most common questions about Systemvetardagen

questions.question: Who can attend Systemvetardagen?
questions.answer: The event is primarily designed for students and recent graduates in IT, Computer Science, System Science, and related technical fields. However, anyone interested is welcome!

questions.question: Do I need to register to attend?
questions.answer: No, registration is not required to attend Systemvetardagen. But you can always sign up to receive updates.

questions.question: Can I book interviews with companies?
questions.answer: Yes! You can schedule one-on-one interviews with companies during the fair using our new platform. Connect directly with recruiters and get ahead by booking your interview slots in advance. Visit meet.systemvetardagen.se to register.

questions.question: What can I expect at the fair?
questions.answer: You can expect company booths, networking opportunities, inspiring lectures, career guidance sessions, and the chance to meet potential employers. Many companies also offer on-site interviews and internship opportunities.

questions.question: What is a Fair'ie?
questions.answer: Fair'ies are volunteers who help make the event run smoothly. As a Fair'ie, you'll assist with logistics while still having time to enjoy the fair, plus you're invited to our exclusive Thank You Party!

questions.question: How can I get more information?
questions.answer: For more information, follow us on social media, or sign up for our newsletter to receive regular updates about the event.
